## Getting Started

1.  Create a free [**GitHub**](https://github.com) account
2.  Log in to [**RStudio Cloud**](https://rstudio.cloud/) using your GitHub account
3.  Familiarize yourself with the [**workshop agenda**](index.qmd)
4.  Interact with this website using **Discussions** (bottom of every page)
5.  Take the [**pre-workshop evaluation**](content/pre-workshop-survey.qmd) survey below
